title: ‘Severance’ Season Finale Recap
description:
Joanna and Mal dive into the finale of the first season of Apple TV’s ‘Severance,’ sharing their instant reactions and deeper thoughts on the season as a whole.Hosts: Joanna Robinson and Malory Rubin
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
